timestamp.description: The date+timestamp which identifies the point in time, where the information was generated, including milliseconds.

locationKey.description: Unique identifier of the sorting center.

messageId.description: The Id of the message sent by the machine. An error Id in case of an error.

message.description:
May contain additional information on the status, e.g. error reason
in case of ERROR. Messages are not meant to be processed
automatically but should just be used for problem
tracking.

description: Response of the device to a Request.
